body: Found the virgin, right below me. Also nice to see another person who isnt immediately appaled by NTR and can critique it like a normal person. Call NTR trash all you like but the trashiest thing about it is its god awful writing, its almost always contrived and often use the same generic tropes. At least this is better than the usual shlock.
She felt guilty, yeah sure, even if it's a alternate end just shows she belongs to the street, did she get pregnant in the other one as well? If not the kid def from the 2 dorks.

That original story is canon and this version is more like saying what will happen if the bf didn't go and get her in the mixed bath and leave her be. But this version NTR element isn't too bad. It's more like she's just having fun herself and goes back to him in the end. She even felt guilty afterwards and initially rejected his advances due to fear of him finding out the sperms in her, but challenged him to have Nakadashi sex if he won the game. And ended up doing it the whole night with him again. And she found herself pregnant, but whether it's bf or the other 2 guys is another story.
I like that the only reason this isn't in the main plot is because mc doubted her and went to check. Kinda funny

Umm... 微妙? It's not as hard as the typical NTR because the personality of characters themselves don't change much than the original version. Those guys in the bath are still virgins (this is their first experience) so they're not playing dirty cards or being too pushy. In the end, they and Mari exchanged contact and say to get in touch if she wants to do it again, but Mari herself probably won't do it. She still loves her boyfriend more, and the author doesn't suddenly change him into a small dick (honestly, why do NTR story always have that ridiculous need for obviously rigged dick measuring contest when they could still flaunt superiority by things like techniques and experience). BTW, she got pregnant, although whether it's from the guys or her boyfriend is story for another time.
